event_text: m_c couldn't help but try to show off by climbing the tallest tree {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/CAP} plan backfired when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell out of the tree.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after falling from a tall tree.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after falling from a tall tree.

event_text: m_c went out of camp alone to practice swimming in the ocean; unfortunately, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} inexperience led to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} being swept up by a riptide. r_c heard {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cries and saved {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, but m_c almost drowned.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from water-inhalation when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} nearly drowned.

event_text: m_c's paw pads aren't used to all the salt water {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} been traipsing around in since becoming an apprentice, they've become cracked and sore.

m_c was dashing around the apprentice rock, when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} slipped and fell into the high tide waters of the cave. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} alright, though a bit bruised and embarrassed.

m_c was messing around in the tide pools of the camp clearing, when {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paw slipped and {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell in face first. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/CAP} pride is wounded, but otherwise {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} only bruised.
m_c unwisely decided to go out swimming alone after r_c dared {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} made it back, but ended up drenched and shivering violently in the cold air.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died after swimming through freezing water when dared by r_c.

event_text: m_c rarely pays attention when r_c talks about proper ocean safety, and it shows when m_c gets thirsty on patrol and drinks salt water. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/come/comes} back to camp severely dehydrated.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of dehydration after drinking salt water.
